messages.content: What is the license under which ComfyUI TextListProduct is released?
ComfyUI TextListProduct is released under the MIT License.
Who is the copyright holder of ComfyUI TextListProduct?
The copyright holder of ComfyUI TextListProduct is Opvel.
In what year was ComfyUI TextListProduct first created?
ComfyUI TextListProduct was created in 2024.
Is there any warranty provided for ComfyUI TextListProduct?
No warranty of any kind, either express or implied, is provided for ComfyUI TextListProduct.
What rights are granted by the MIT License?
Under the MIT License, the right to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and sell copies of the Software is granted, subject to the conditions specified in the license.
What conditions must be met to permit the distribution of ComfyUI TextListProduct?
For ComfyUI TextListProduct, the above copyright notice and this permission notice must be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
List the explicit responsibilities of the authors or copyright holders under the MIT License.
According to the MIT License, the authors or copyright holders cannot be held liable for any claims, damages or other liability resulting from the use or distribution of the Software.
What is Comfy UI Text List Product?
Comfy UI Text List Product is a custom node for Comfy UI that wraps itertools.product and can be used to create patterns by combining prompts.
What is the recommended installation combination for Comfy UI Text List Product?
It is recommended to install Comfy UI Text List Product in combination with the nodes from the WAS Node Suite.
How can you generate 8 patterns using Comfy UI Text List Product?
By connecting to the WAS Node Suite's Text Load Line From File and specifying 8 in Comfy UI's Queue Prompt, you can generate 8 patterns.
What is the process to install Comfy UI Text List Product?
Open the ComfyUI Manager, click on 'Install via Git URL', enter 'https://github.com/opvelll/ComfyUI_TextListProduct', and press OK.
What does the TextListProduct node do?
The TextListProduct node combines two lists and creates a new list joined by the specified separator.
What are TextListProductWithSingleA, TextListProductWithSingleB, and TextListProductWithSingleBoth nodes used for?
These nodes are shorthand nodes for when you want to use single words from one or both lists in TextListProduct.
What does the ProductedString node do?
The ProductedString node combines multiple lists and returns a multiline string with line breaks.
What is an example usage of Comfy UI Text List Product?

You can use Comfy UI Text List Product to add a specified string at the beginning of the strings in the list, combine expression patterns, pose patterns, camera work patterns, and use the Save Text File node from the WAS Node Suite to generate a text file.
Under what license is Comfy UI Text List Product distributed?
Comfy UI Text List Product is distributed under the MIT license.
